comments.author: randy
comments.content: Ten years is a long time in tech. By your reasoning pretty much anyone who holds bitcoins now will be rich. I'm not willing to go that far in my predictions. The major thing holding Bitcoin back now is its volatility and that it's linked to other currencies to be usable.
